name: Finials Dining Chair with Upholstered Seat
description: Introducing the Finials Dining Chair with Upholstered Seat – a contemporary interpretation of timeless European chair design. Meticulously crafted from solid teakwood, the chair's frame harmoniously marries opulent stained wood with a plush upholstered seat. The intricate finial details adorning the chair's back pay homage to vintage influences. Designed for both style and comfort, the upholstered seat pad ensures a comfortable dining experience. The soft cushion, upholstered in an easy clean linen-look fabric, maximises comfort while maintaining practicality—a perfect balance of luxury and functionality. The frame is handcrafted in Indonesia by skilled artisans, each chair reflects a dedication to craftsmanship and attention to detail. The seat is upholstered in England.
